Name: Toddy Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: An ice cold but warming combo of Scotch, honey and lemon.
History: Created in 2001 by Jamie Terrell at LAB, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Toddy Cocktail contains 132 calories
